title: Solarwinds Review |THWACK
author: muvo
text:
1. What industry is your company in?
 The transportation industry
2. How large is your IT shop? (Small (1-250 elements); Medium (251 – 2000 elements); Large (2001 to 10000 elements); Extra-large (greater than 10,000 elements)
 Our IT shop is Extra-large
3. Which SolarWinds product are you writing this review for?
 SRM
4. What problem were you trying to solve when you purchased?
 We were trying to consolidate all of our storage monitors to a single monitoring tool. Solarwinds allowed us to do this without giving up our legacy monitor functionality
5. Did you consider options other than SolarWinds? Who?
 Yes we considered a few different vendors. Most notably a Microsoft product. Solarwinds outshined from a cost/value perspective by far.
6. How are you using the product and what benefits have you seen?
 We're using the product on 90% of our storage resources that we have. The most notable benefit is the ability to create custom dashboards and pages that are easy to use and understand.
